DOC.brief_summary: During past four decade , gynecologic laparoscopy evolve limited method advance operative approach frequently serve substitute laparotomy . The advantage laparoscopy laparotomy include less postoperative pain , short hospital stay , reduce blood loss . However , surgery CO2 increase intra-abdominal intrathoracic pressure , lead cardiac output decrease increase sympathetic activity reflex . On hand , CO2 accumulation body lead hypercapnia , indirectly stimulate aortic body chemosensory organ carotid sinus , increase concentration plasma catecholamine , cortisol vasopressin , responses important impact patient recovery surgery . Acupuncture ancient Chinese method treat disease relieve pain . Transcutaneous electrical acupoint stimulation ( TEAS ) , noninvasive adjunctive intervention base acupuncture , widely accept used worldwide . To date , multiple study demonstrate TEAS could reduce intra-operative opioid drug consumption , reduce incidence postoperative nausea vomiting ( PONV ) improve postoperative cognitive function . However , whether TEAS could improve quality early recovery gynecologic laparoscopy unknown . In study therefore investigated effect TEAS acupoints Baihui ( GV20 ) , Yingtang ( EX-HN3 ) , Zusanli ( ST36 ) Neiguan ( PC6 ) quality early recovery patient undergoing gynecological laparoscopic surgery .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect TEAS Quality Early Recovery
DOC.detailed_description: Patient population Sixty patient undergo elective gynecological laparoscopic surgery Guizhou province people 's hospital ASA physical status I-II recruit November 2013 November 2014 . Their age range 29-60 yr. Exclusion criterion recent use TEAS acupuncture , neural damage infection along meridian acupoints lay , use antiemetic previous week , regular use opioids , hepatic dysfunction , confirm renal impairment , diabetes mellitus , cognitive dysfunction conversion laparotomy gynecologic laparoscopy . Randomization blind Patients assign either TEAS stimulus ( TEAS group ) control group ( Con group ) basis random number generate computer . Only acupuncturist informed randomization allocation , onset TEAS . None anesthesiologist , surgeon , physicians post-anesthesia care unit ( PACU ) , participant aware allocation . Blinding patient ensure use gel electrode therapeutic setting , previously prove successful strategy . TEAS protocol An experienced acupuncturist perform TEAS 30 min anesthesia . According theory traditional Chinese medicine , bilateral Baihui ( GV20 ) , Yingtang ( EX-HN3 ) , Zusanli ( ST36 ) Neiguan ( PC6 ) choose acupuncture point . These acupoints identify accord traditional anatomic localization . Gel electrodes applied skin clean ethyl alcohol . The acupoints stimulate electrically intensity 12-15 mA dense-disperse frequency 2/100 Hz 30 min , use Hwato electronic acupuncture treatment instrument ( model No . SDZ-V , Suzhou Medical Appliances Co. , Ltd , Suzhou , China ) . The intensity adjust maintain slight twitch local muscle accord individual maximum tolerance , indicate satisfactory De-Qi phenomenon thus adequate stimulation . The patient control group electrodes apply received stimulation . Anesthesia perioperative management One surgeon conduct surgery accord standard protocol ; surgery commence 8:30 1:00 p.m. Anesthesia induce i.v . propofol remifentanil use target-controlled infusion ( TCI ) system . After loss consciousness , vecuronium ( 0.1 mg kg-1 ) administer i.v. , patient orotracheally intubed 5 min later . Anesthesia maintain TCI propofol remifentanil . The depth anesthesia monitor use index ( BIS ) . Effect site concentration propofol remifentanil adjust hemodynamic BIS . Patients ' lung mechanically ventilate volume-controlled mode tidal volume 8ml kg-1 body weight operation . In group , remifentanil propofol infusion stop 5 min end surgery . Patients extubated transferred PACU surgery . Data collection Baseline data include demographic , body mass index ( BMI ) , ASA physical status . Surgical information record include anesthesia duration , surgery duration , estimate blood loss , intraoperative medication . Postoperative data collect regard incidence nausea vomiting , postoperative pain medication antiemetic . The Quality Recovery-40 ( QoR-40 ) validate scale 5 domain 10-12 . These measure physical comfort , emotional state , physical independence , psychological support , pain . Each domain score maximum global score 200 . QoR-40 score find associate quality-of-life scale patient satisfaction index 13 well postoperative pain 14 . In present study , QoR-40 evaluation perform preoperative day 1 ( T0 ) , postoperative day 1 ( T1 ) postoperative day 2 ( T2 ) . Visual analog scale ( VAS ) widely use behavioral science previous study report usefulness validity 15 , 16 . VAS score rest query level pain postoperative day 1 ( T1 ) postoperative day 2 ( T2 ) . The Mini-Mental State Examination ( MMSE ) one widely use assessment instrument cognitive function postoperatively , screen domains orientation time place , attention memory , concentration , language praxis 17 . Patient cognitive function assess use MMSE preoperative day 1 ( T0 ) , postoperative day 1 ( T1 ) postoperative day 2 ( T2 ) . Statistical analysis All statistical analysis perform use SPSS 13.0 ( SPSS , Inc. , Chicago , IL , USA ) . Continuous variable present mean ( SD ) compare use unpaired Student's-test . Dichotomus variable present number patient ( percent ) analyze use X2 test . The level significance statistical test set 0.05 .
DOC.criteria: Patients undergo elective gynecological laparoscopic surgery . ASA physical status III . Ages range 2960 yr . Recent use TEAS acupuncture . Neural damage infection along meridian acupoints lay . Use antiemetic previous week . Regular use opioids . Hepatic dysfunction . Confirmed renal impairment . Diabetes mellitus Cognitive dysfunction Conversion laparotomy gynecologic laparoscopy .
